definition.procedurexml: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?><xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block deletable="false" type="event_trigger" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="entity_send_chat"><comment h="52" pinned="false" w="289">This gets the coordinates of the provided entity, then prints the coordinates in the action bar.</comment><value name="text"><block inline="false" type="text_join"><mutation items="8"/><value name="ADD0"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">PlayerMana: </field></block></value><value name="ADD1"><block type="entity_nbt_num_get"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value><value name="tagName"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">PlayerMana</field></block></value></block></value><value name="ADD2"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">PowerChoice:</field></block></value><value name="ADD3"><block type="item_nbt_num_get"><value name="tagName"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">PowerChoice</field></block></value><value name="item"><block type="itemstack_to_mcitem"/></value></block></value><value name="ADD4"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">XPAmount: </field></block></value><value name="ADD5"><block type="item_nbt_num_get"><value name="tagName"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">XPAmount</field></block></value><value name="item"><block type="itemstack_to_mcitem"/></value></block></value><value name="ADD6"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">ItemLevel: </field></block></value><value name="ADD7"><block type="item_nbt_num_get"><value name="tagName"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">ItemLevel</field></block></value><value name="item"><block type="itemstack_to_mcitem"/></value></block></value></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value><value name="actbar"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">TRUE</field></block></value></block></next></block></xml>
